In M. bovis, a large deletion of 2775 bp (RD12) leads to the loss of the COOH part of cysA3, the following CDSs, sseC1, moaE1, Rv3120 and a large part of cyp141 except the COOH end, compared to the homolog in M. tuberculosis strain H37Rv.
Merged with Rv3117 in bovis to form Mb3144 (cyp141)

In M. bovis, a 3007 bp deletion (RD13) leads to the fusion of Rv1257c and Rv1255c, and the deletion of Rv1256c, compared to M. tuberculosis strain H37Rv.
Merged with Rv1255c in bovis to form Mb1287c
Merged with Rv1257c in bovis to form Mb1287c

In M. bovis, a large 8963 bp deletion (RD5) leads to the loss of the NH2 part of Mb2375c, and the 9 following CDSs up to Rv2356 including the 3 phospolipases C enzymes plcC, plcB and plcA, compared to the homolog in M. tuberculosis H37Rv.
Truncated in M. bovis AF2122/97 to form Mb2375c
In M. bovis, a large deletion of 4926 bp (RD6) leads to the loss of the COOH part of PPE57, and the following CDSs, PPE58, Rv3427c, Rv3428c and PPE59 compared to M. tuberculosis strain H37Rv.
In M. bovis, a large deletion of 4926 bp (RD6) leads to the loss of the COOH part of PPE57, and the following CDSs, PPE58, Rv3427c, Rv3428c and PPE59 compared to M. tuberculosis strain H37Rv.
Truncated in M. bovis AF2122/97 to form Mb3459
In M. bovis, a large deletion of 12719 bp (RD7) leads to the loss of the COOH part of yrbE3A, the entire mce3 operon and the following genes up to Mb2000 compared to M. tuberculosis strain H37Rv.
Truncated in M. bovis AF2122/97 to form Mb1999

In M. bovis, a large 2029 bp deletion (RD9) leads to the loss of the COOH part of Mb2100c, the entire Rv2074 and Rv2073, and the NH2 part of cobL compared to its homolog in M. tuberculosis strain H37Rv.
Truncated in M. bovis AF2122/97 to form Mb2100c

In M. tuberculosis strain H37Rv, a large deletion region (RvD1) exists in between Rv2023 and Rv2024. In M. bovis a 5000 bp insertion at this region results in Mb2049c being a much larger product with a different COOH part (1606 aa versus 515 aa).
